DDL.statement: CREATE VIEW VIEW_PALLET_HISTORY_EXPIRY AS (select p.*,b.expiry_date,m.description from APP_PALLET_HISTORY p, APP_MATERIAL_BATCH b, APP_MATERIAL m where b.material = p.material and b.batch_number = p.batch_number and m.material = p.material)
CREATE VIEW VIEW_PALLET_HISTORY AS (select * from APP_PALLET_HISTORY)
